#{id},

SELECT T_IMPORT_BATCH_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into t_import_batch (id, po_no, po_item, factory, material_no, batch_no, import_id, unit, qty, produce_time, overdue_time, add_user, g_weight, n_weight, package_type, b_size) select T_IMPORT_BATCH_SEQ.nextval, A.* FROM (
select #{item.poNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.poItem, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.factory, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.materialNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.batchNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.importId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.unit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.qty, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.produceTime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.overdueTime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.addUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gWeight, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.nWeight, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.packageType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
) A
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_import_batch
po_no = #{poNo},
po_item = #{poItem},
factory = #{factory},
material_no = #{materialNo},
batch_no = #{batchNo},
import_id = #{importId},
unit = #{unit},
qty = #{qty},
sap_batch_no = #{sapBatchNo},
produce_time = #{produceTime},
overdue_time = #{overdueTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime},
n_weight = #{nWeight},
g_weight = #{gWeight},
package_type = #{packageType},
b_size = #{bSize},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_import_batch t where t.sap_batch_no is null and t.import_id = (select m.id from t_import m where m.ir_no = #{irNo})
